item.title: Lightgallery in Markdown
item.description: Many people use mkdocs for their documentation needs. Implementing a working lightbox for images does seem to be hard for some people to do! Getting a working lightbox js extension for all images in your Mardown docs is actually fairly simple, with the lightgallery-markdown package on Github.
